articles.title: Adani's $1.1 bn copper project in Gujarat to start operations from Mar 2024 - Business Standard
articles.description: Billionaire Gautam Adani-led group's copper-producing factory at Mundra in Gujarat will start operations from March next year, helping cut India's dependence on imports and aiding energy transition, sources said.
articles.content: For Phase-1, capacity of 0.5 million tonnes per annum, KCL has achieved financial closure through a syndicated club loan, sources with direct knowledge of the matter said | Photo: Bloomberg
